### d3heatmap
<https://github.com/rstudio/d3heatmap>

Interactive heatmaps with D3 including support for row/column highlighting and zooming.

```{r, include=FALSE}
mtcars <- head(mtcars, n = 20)
```


```{r}
library(d3heatmap)
d3heatmap(mtcars, scale="column", colors="Blues")
```
